title: Whats the point of xerath vs ezrael?
body:
Ap ezrael seems to do everything better than xerath
Hes mobile
Deals even more poke
Can all in better
And his ult is realy global

replies.body:
- Wave clear -> Xerath
- CC -> Xerath
- Early Game -> Xerath
- Range auf restlichen spells -> Xerath
